p: For N analysis, plant sample (grain) was digested with concentrated H 2SO 4 for 1 to 2 hours at 420Â°C until green color was obtained. Then N in the digest was determined by Micro-Kjeldahl steam distillation method [ 23]. The P and K in grain samples were determined in the digests of tri-acid mixture (HNO 3:H 2SO 4:HClO 4, 9:1:4) using UV-VIS spectrophotometer and flame photometer, respectively [ 19]. The uptake of nutrients (NPK) for grain was calculated from their respective concentration in plant parts separately using the following formula [ 24].
